alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:18PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL COLFAX COUNTY THROUGH 245 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Springer, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springer, Maxwell and Raton Crews Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 411 and 440. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 312 and 337. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
